mapper.sql: CASE WHEN t.relationType='0' THEN (select fullName from fop_company where id = t.relationId) WHEN t.relationType='1' THEN (select fullName from fop_association where id = t.relationId) END displayName, t.id, t.projectName, t.projectCode, t.process, t.personId, t.areaCode, t.projectType, t.relationId, t.sector, t.coopType, t.releaseDate, t.clicks, t.likes, t.remark, t.status, t.createUserId, t.coopDesc, t.createUserName, t.createDate, t.lastModifyUserId, t.lastModifyUserName, t.lastModifyDate, t.relationType
